problem: #include<stdio.h>
i;main(n,j){for(n<<=atoi(gets(j));i++<n;)for(j=n;j--;)putchar(__builtin_parity(i&j)+42);}
fixed: i;main(n,j){for(n<<=atoi(gets(j));i++<n;puts(" "))for(j=n;j--;)putchar(__builtin_parity(i&j)+42);}

problem: a,b,c,k,i,j,A,B,C;main(t){for(scanf("%d",&t);~scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&c);printf("%d ",t))for(t=j=0;128/++j;A>a|B>b|C>c|k<t?:t=k)for(k=A=B=C=i=0;++i<8;)j>>(i-1)&1?A+=i&1,B+=i/2&1,C+=i/4&1,++k:0;}
fixed: a,b,c,k,i,j,A,B,C;main(t){for(scanf("%d",&t);~scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&c);printf("%d ",t))for(t=j=0;128/++j;t=A>a|B>b|C>c|k<t?t:k)for(k=A=B=C=i=0;++i<8;)j>>(i-1)&1?A+=i&1,B+=i/2&1,C+=i/4&1,++k:0;}
